title: Burn Up Scramble
synopsis: AD. 2023, Tokyo. Because of the change of the society such as internationalization and enlargement of the trading, the dark side of the society also continues changing. The criminals are getting deep, and their organizations are increasing its size, then the peace and security is getting worse.
staff: [['Kawase, Kouhei', ['Producer']], ['Hayashi, Hiroki', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Hanyuu, Naoyasu', ['Episode Director']]]
